DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether acupuncture effective safe treatment Primary Sjögren Syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blinded , sham acupuncture control trial aim assess effectiveness safety acupuncture treatment Primary Sjögren Syndrome.The eligible participant randomly allocate receive acupuncture sham acupuncture 8 week . Assuming two-sided alpha 0.05 , power 85 % , 20 % drop-out , sample size 30 would need group . The statistical analysis base intention-to-treat principle . Continuous variable compare Student test Mann-Whitney U test ; categorical variable analyze chi-square test , Fisher 's exact test Kruskal-Wallis H test appropriate . For comparison two time point , pair t-test Wilcoxon sign rank test use appropriate . A statistically significant difference set P < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: To fulfill AmericanEuropean Consensus Group Criteria primary Sjögren syndrome . With symptom primary Sjögren syndrome le 5 year . With acupuncture contraindication ( allergy metal , skin lesion relative acupoints , etc . ) Taking take medicine primary Sjögren syndrome within last 4 week enrollment .
